name: PSN Status Widget
author: Niraj Shah

sections.description:
This sidebar widget displays the status of the PlayStation Network on your blog. It’s simple to install and setup. You can choose to display the PSN Status for one of 26 countries.

Example

You can see a examples of the widget on my blog:

  • http://www.xtremeps3.com/
sections.installation:
1. Upload psn-status-widget.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the widget to your Sidebar
  4. Configure the widget as required (title and region)
  5. And you’re done!
sections.changelog:
v0.5:

  • Minor improvements to plugin for WordPress 5.0

v0.4:

  • Improved compatibility of Widget
  • Updates for GDPR compliance

v0.3:

  • Bug fixes

v0.2:

  • Country selection added to the widget. You can now set the Widget to display the PSN status for one of 26 countries.

short_description: Widget that shows the status of the PlayStation Network on your blog for your chosen region.
